subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cross-dressing prostitutes lied when they accused A.C. Milan striker Ronaldo of using drugs and having sex with them during a motel encounter last week, the police said. The prostitutes told the police they lied because Ronaldo did not want to pay them after finding out they were men, police inspector Carlos Augusto Nogueira said.
snippet: Cross-dressing prostitutes lied when they accused A.C. Milan striker Ronaldo of using drugs and having sex with them during a motel encounter last week, the police said. The prostitutes told the police they lied because Ronaldo did not want to pay...
